name: Hide Cookie Consent Prompts
description: Attempts to hide all pop up boxes that ask for your consent to store cookies, such as those implemented in response to the GPDR. If you find these pop-up notices to be annoying, often misleading, and almost always intrusive, then this style is for you!
additional_info: 2019-06-21: Version 0.91 beta - Added more global cases - Split out specific from global cases 2019-05-18: Version 0.90 beta - Initial launch - This version has not been tested by any peers
